presentationColumns.name: Aging Amount - Invoice Date Basis
presentationColumns.description: Shows the aging amount for the open invoices based on Invoice open date grouped by selected aging period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Aging Amount - Invoice Date Basis in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Aging Count - Invoice Date Basis
presentationColumns.description: Shows the aging count for the open invoices based on Invoice open date grouped by selected aging period. The grain for this is invoice payment schedule.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Aging Count - Invoice Date Basis

presentationColumns.name: Aging Amount - Schedule Date Basis
presentationColumns.description: Shows the aging amount for the open invoices based on Schedule date grouped by selected aging period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Aging Amount - Schedule Date Basis in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Aging Count - Schedule Date Basis
presentationColumns.description: Shows the aging count for the open invoices based on Schedule date grouped by selected aging period. The grain for this is invoice payment schedule.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Aging Count - Schedule Date Basis

presentationColumns.name: Open Invoices Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the total invoice amount for the invoices that are fully open and partially open.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Open Invoices Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Outstanding Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the outstanding invoice amount which includes current and overdue invoices.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Total Outstanding Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Outstanding Invoices Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the count of outstanding invoices computed as follows: (Current Invoices Count + Overdue Invoices Count)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Total Outstanding Invoices Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Invoice Days Outstanding
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Total number of days invoice outstanding / Total outstanding Invoices Count. This is based on Invoice date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Avg Invoice Days Outstanding

presentationColumns.name: Current Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices amount which are yet to cross the schedule due date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Current Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Current Invoices Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count which are yet to cross the schedule due date. The grain for this is invoice payment schedule.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Current Invoices Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Invoice Days Current
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Total number of days before due date / Current Invoices Count. This is based on schedule date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Avg Invoice Days Current

presentationColumns.name: Current Amount to Total Outstanding %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Current Amount / Total Outstanding Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Current Amount to Total Outstanding % in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Current Count to Total Outstanding %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Current Invoices Count / Total Outstanding Invoices Count) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Current Count to Total Outstanding %

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices amount which has crossed the schedule due date. The grain for this is invoice payment schedule.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Overdue Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Invoices Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count which has crossed the schedule due date. The grain for this is invoice payment schedule.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Overdue Invoices Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Invoice Days Overdue
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Total number of days invoice overdue / Overdue Invoices Count. This is based on schedule date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Avg Invoice Days Overdue

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Amount to Total Outstanding %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Overdue Amount / Total Outstanding Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Overdue Amount to Total Outstanding % in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Count to Total Outstanding %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Overdue Invoices Count / Total Outstanding Invoices Count) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Overdue Count to Total Outstanding %

presentationColumns.name: Aging Hold Amount - Invoice Date Basis
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Aging Hold Amount - Invoice Date Basis in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Aging Hold Count - Invoice Date Basis

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Current Invoices on Hold Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Current Invoices on Hold Count

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Invoices on Hold Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.Overdue Invoices on Hold Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: AP Due upto 30 Days
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.AP Due upto 30 Days in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Amount Due Next 30 Days
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Overdue Amount + Upcoming dues for 30 days for open invoices.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Aging.AP Due upto 30 Days in Analytics Currency
